biotools.summary: Tool/software developed in Perl to search the chromatin domain boundary element sequences in 12 Drosophila species. It uses recognition sequences of boundary interacting proteins and looks for ‘motif clusters’ under a set of constrains to predict boundary element sequences.

bioschemas.name: cdBEST
bioschemas.summary: Tool/software developed in Perl to search the chromatin domain boundary element sequences in 12 Drosophila species. It uses recognition sequences of boundary interacting proteins and looks for ‘motif clusters’ under a set of constrains to predict boundary element sequences.
